ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups sugar snap peas, strings removed

cookingTips: Remove strings from sugar snap peas before cooking for pleasant eating experience
Cook at high heat for just 2-3 minutes to maintain crunchiness
Use fresh garlic for maximum flavor impact
